phrs.translation: 哎呀！天哪！（表示诧异， 吃惊， 恐惧的感叹语）

sentences.sentence: How it grieves me that I had him killed!
sentences.translation: 我派人把他杀死了，我多么难过啊！

sentences.sentence: "It grieves me to confess it had indeed escaped me," said Tom, in a hesitating voice; and blushed again.
sentences.translation: “我真难过，我承认我实在是忘了这回事。”汤姆吞吞吐吐地说；并再次脸红了。

sentences.sentence: "Child, I must tell you something now which will grieve you as much as it grieves me," replied the doctor.
sentences.translation: “孩子，我现在必须告诉你一件事，这件事会使你难过，也会使我难过。”医生回答说。
